snippet: After a near collapse, the San Diego Opera is engaging in a rescue mission, hoping to prove that opera can still thrive not only in San Diego but across the country.
abstract: San Diego Opera, facing extinction, is revived by unlikely coalition of opera buffs, labor unions and community leaders concerned about threat of company's collapse, and effect that would have on city's civic reputation; fund-raising campaign brings in $2.23 million and opera will engage in cost-cutting endeavors; back-from-the-dead drama brings hope to opera companies across the country.
lead_paragraph: After a near collapse, the San Diego Opera is engaging in a rescue mission, hoping to prove that opera can still thrive not only in San Diego but across the country.

headline.seo: San Diego Opera Downsizes to Survive
headline.main: Amid Choruses of Despair, an Aria of Hope
headline.print_headline: Amid Choruses of Despair, an Aria of Hope
